message.body: You got it on the spot?
That's awesome. What's the package and where is it?
Yeah! I am now an actual registered nurse!
Hoooo, congratulations. Do you know the pay? Getting benefits, or is it just hourly with nothing else?
I didn't ask. Michael said that wouldn't be good. But either way, I don't care. As long as it's more than 10 an hour! Haha. And if there's no benefits, I
'm still under my dads so I don't need it. All I know is that night shift normally gets paid a little more.
I would generally ask about the package before accepting an offer, but considering it's an actual nursing position, it should be higher than 10 by a large margin.
And it's close. I'm happy everything worked out.
Oh yeah. But beggars can't be choosers. I'm so happy. A huge weight has been lifted. Thanks!
I think Michael and I are going with you to Baltimore tomorrow, right? Do you know what time you plan on leaving?
My appointment is at 2, so at latest 12. We should leave earlier though. 10?
